individual_metadata.synopsis: One-line dialogues if you speak to this guard before or after completing the Templar dialogue, and agreeing to help Vlaakith
individual_metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the captain's guard in the Security Office - SecurityOfficer01.

0.speaker: Warrior Brelal'reth
0.text: Our purpose is almost fulfilled. You must cleanse the weapon, as Vlaakith instructed.

1.speaker: Warrior Brelal'reth
1.text: Our queen chose you... Vlaakith gha'g shkath zai!
1.context: NodeContext: stunned, changes attitude now Vlaakith spoke with the player

2.speaker: Warrior Brelal'reth
2.text: The ch'r'ai is down these stairs, kin. I hope the news you bring is welcome.

3.speaker: Warrior Brelal'reth
3.text: Speaking with the ch'r'ai's is an honour. Do not squander it.
